name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 125,855 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Use: Increases your Mastery by 6,531 for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your attacks have a high chance to apply Queensbane to your target, dealing 144,005 Shadow damage over 10 sec.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
